modName: Ingredients Prefix - Make Most Valuable Potions
summary: It adds prefix that can make potions which is most valuable.
descriptionHtml:
It adds prefix that can make potions which is most valuable like screenshots.

You don't have to use another tool to make most valuable potions, just mix adjacent ingredients in list to make potions.

Fortify Enchanting, Fortify Smithing ingredients(Blisterwort, Hagraven claw, Spriggan sap) is exception. They renamed to upper case and added prefix '!' to use them easily.

I made it for personal use, so It is all-DLC merged. If you need No-DLC or partial DLC Version, I prefer editing this file yourself. You can upload editted file without permission, so freely edit and upload everywhere.

I can't speak english well, so pardon me awkward description.
author: Reinvert
